name: Space Rock
description: Heavy use of synthesizers and guitar effects to create dense atmospheric soundscapes intended to evoke images of outer space and science fiction scenarios.

children.name: Space Rock Revival
children.description: Draws from the aesthetics and atmospheric soundscapes of Space Rock combined with the more minimal, back-to-basics approach of the Post-Punk era.
